SEARCH
Module ui
Package engine.bot.rule_based_old

Class ComparingAndScoring

java.lang.Object
engine.bot.rule_based_old.ComparingAndScoring
All Implemented Interfaces:
BotInterface
public class ComparingAndScoring extends Object implements BotInterface
This class is responsible for comparing and scoring different vectors for the bot to "play" the game It uses the CheckCollisionAndHeight class to check for 1. collisions and 2. height differences.
